decks.notes: The main concept of this Bant Aggro deck is to maintain a strong board presence while consistently applying pressure to the opponent. The deck focuses on utilizing creatures like Bounding Krasis, Duskwatch Recruiter, Sylvan Advocate, and Reflector Mage to control the opponent's board and disrupt their game plan. It also includes utility cards like Jace, Vryn's Prodigy and Den Protector for card advantage and recursion. Additionally, the deck utilizes Collected Company to quickly flood the board with more creatures and potentially close out games.

This deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures quickly to put pressure on the opponent. Using cards like Kytheon, Hero of Akros and Thalia's Lieutenant to increase the power of the weenies, along with cards like Consul's Lieutenant and Hanweir Militia Captain to provide additional support. Always Watching boosts the creatures' power and toughness, while Declaration in Stone helps to remove any threats on the opponent's side. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures and outpace them before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing various burn spells and card draw to control the game. It aims to stall the opponent's board with counterspells and removal cards like Lightning Axe and Kozilek's Return, while building up card advantage with efficient card draw cards like Tormenting Voice and Magmatic Insight. The key strategy is to play defensively with control spells and then finish off the opponent with powerful spells like Fall of the Titans or Chandra, Flamecaller once the board is under control.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize aggressive Eldrazi creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By combining powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Eldrazi Displacer with support cards like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain control of the board. Additionally, cards like Declaration in Stone and Anguished Unmaking provide removal options to deal with threats from the opponent. The deck also includes mana producers like Hedron Crawler and Knight of the White Orchid to ensure a smooth mana curve.

This deck focuses on resource denial and removal, using a combination of sweepers like Languish and individual removal spells like Anguished Unmaking and Stasis Snare to control the board. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Ob Nixilis Reignited and Sorin, Grim Nemesis to generate card advantage and pressure the opponent. The win condition is to stabilize the board with powerful creatures like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Transgress the Mind and Declaration in Stone. The mana base is built to support the deck's double-colored casting costs and provide consistent access to all colors.

This deck focuses on quickly swarming the battlefield with low-cost white creatures and boosting their power with anthem effects like Always Watching and Thalia's Lieutenant. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures, while also disrupting their board with cards like Declaration in Stone and Archangel of Tithes. The deck includes a mix of early game threats like Kytheon, Hero of Akros and Consul's Lieutenant, while also providing some late-game power with cards like Tireless Tracker and Westvale Abbey. It aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost, efficient white creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Always Watching to buff creatures and Declaration in Stone for removal. Cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Reflector Mage help to support the weenie strategy, while powerful creatures like Archangel Avacyn and Dragonlord Ojutai provide additional threats. This deck aims to establish early board presence and maintain pressure throughout the game, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of low-cost, aggressive white creatures. Cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Always Watching help boost the power of your creatures, while Declaration in Stone and Reflector Mage provide removal and disruption to control your opponent's board. The deck also includes a mix of flying creatures like Archangel Avacyn and Dragonlord Ojutai for added versatility. The mana base consists of primarily white sources to ensure consistency in casting your spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of creatures with flash abilities, mana ramp, and card advantage to quickly overwhelm the opponent and maintain board control. By consistently putting pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Reflector Mage and Sylvan Advocate, while also having the flexibility to play instant spells like Collected Company and Dromoka's Command, the deck aims to consistently stay ahead in tempo and outvalue the opponent in the long run. The inclusion of key cards like Archangel Avacyn and Den Protector provides additional versatility and resilience to removal spells.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on utilizing creatures with flash and enter the battlefield abilities to disrupt the opponent's board while maintaining aggression. The inclusion of cards like Reflector Mage and Bounding Krasis allows the deck to control the tempo of the game, while cards like Sylvan Advocate and Tireless Tracker provide a solid base of creatures to apply pressure. The deck also includes powerful spells like Collected Company and Dromoka's Command to further support the aggressive game plan. By efficiently utilizing its creatures and spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

Utilizing a combination of powerful dragons and planeswalkers, this deck aims to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and drawing cards for advantage. By creating a strong board presence with Dragonlord Ojutai and Dragonlord Silumgar, while controlling the board with counterspells and removal, this deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure victory through card advantage and strategic plays. With a focus on card advantage and efficient removal, this deck aims to take control of the game and dictate the pace of the match.

The main concept of this deck is to swarm the battlefield with aggressive Eldrazi creatures and support cards to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck focuses on powerful creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer, supplemented by spells like Roast and Spatial Contortion for removal and control. Pia and Kiran Nalaar provide additional creature support, while cards like Hangarback Walker and Thopter Engineer generate additional threats. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize aggressive Eldrazi creatures to put pressure on the opponent while also having access to removal spells and powerful planeswalkers. This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with Thought-Knot Seer and Eldrazi Displacer while also presenting threats like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Ultimate Price and Anguished Unmaking to clear the way for its creatures. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing small, efficient creatures in combination with powerful anthem effects to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing cards like Knight of the White Orchid and Thalia's Lieutenant, the deck can establish a strong board presence early on. Cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Archangel Avacyn provide additional support and finishers to help secure victory. The inclusion of removal spells like Declaration in Stone helps to clear the way for your creatures to attack freely. Ultimately, the strategy revolves around building a fast and aggressive board presence to pressure the opponent and secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures. By utilizing cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Always Watching to boost the power of your creatures, combined with removal spells like Declaration in Stone, the deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence and apply constant pressure. The inclusion of cards like Reflector Mage and Archangel of Tithes provides additional utility and disruption to control the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to win by quickly building a strong board and maintaining pressure throughout the game.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a swarm of small, efficient creatures in a Weenie White aggro strategy. Cards like Hanweir Militia Captain, Knight of the White Orchid, and Thalia's Lieutenant help to pump up the team while cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Archangel of Tithes provide additional support and disruption. Declaration in Stone and Stasis Snare help remove opposing threats, allowing for an aggressive and efficient offense to push through for victory.
